name: Pocket Fan Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true pocket fan.
Pocket Fan Simulator - a game simulator joke, where you can play on your phone as a hand-fan!
Note the application only sim fan and can not harm your health!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our apps! Leave us feedback and we will try to make them even better!
